snippet: Jason Kidd, 39, is expected to mentor Jeremy Lin for the Knicks, while Marcus Camby, 38, will be looked upon to bolster the defense.
abstract: Star point guard Jason Kidd, who signed with the New York Knicks as a free agent, is expected to mentor Jeremy Lin, while center Marcus Camby, acquired from the Houston Rockets in a sign-and-trade deal, will be looked upon to bolster the defense.
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, 39, is expected to mentor Jeremy Lin for the Knicks, while Marcus Camby, 38, will be looked upon to bolster the defense.

headline.seo: Kidd and Camby Introduced as the Newest Knicks
headline.main: Kidd Looks Forward to Playing a Mentor’s Role
headline.print_headline: Kidd Looks Forward to Playing a Mentor’s Role
